elementor-element elementor-element-8458921 elementor-widget__width-inherit elementor-absolute elementor-widget elementor-widget-html

div.h2: EDUCATING LIBERATED SCHOLARS OF IMPECCABLE CHARACTER

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-664f41a accordion-section elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-a3f321b column-1 elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column

div.p: We educate scholars through a rigorous curriculum focused on art, Latin, debate and other disciplines proven to prepare students for success now and for the rest of their lives.

div.a: Empower Scholars in the South Bronx

div.p: Our structured, supportive environment ensures scholars achieve the highest academic results despite living in one of the most underserved congressional district in the United States.
Scholars graduate Classical with access to the best high schools in New York City, drastically altering their future opportunities.

div.class: events-tracker-for-elementor elementor-element elementor-element-cf3da9f font-calibri elementor-widget elementor-widget-button
elementor-element elementor-element-8bc1c69 column-2 elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-43b3381 our-plus elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-inner-section
elementor-element elementor-element-7cb3c47 elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section
elementor-element elementor-element-e3efe20 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-inner-section

div.p: Learning should never stop. Classical Charter Schools is committed to continuing education for all scholars during these difficult times. To access remote learning resources, please visit our new page dedicated to providing everything families need to continue learning at home.

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-9fa3556 results-item-subtitle font-calibri elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor

div.p: Among the state’s best in English Language Arts

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-55a9b7e results-item-subtitle font-calibri elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor

div.p: Superior Results on Rigorous Next Generation Standards

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-22a4dcc elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-0658c62 section-meta-title font-calibri elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor

div.p: THE MAJORITY OF OUR SCHOLARS EARN ACCEPTANCE TO ONE OF THEIR TOP THREE HIGH SCHOOL CHOICES

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-70ede12 high-schools-item elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-inner-section

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-fd0adb0 elementor-view-default elementor-position-top elementor-vertical-align-top elementor-widget elementor-widget-icon-box

div.p: A highly specialized high school from which alumni are esteemed for their achievements in math and science.

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-ebac12d elementor-view-default elementor-position-top elementor-vertical-align-top elementor-widget elementor-widget-icon-box

div.p: An academically rigorous high school that prides itself on preparing students for professional leadership roles

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-2fa2a79 elementor-view-default elementor-position-top elementor-vertical-align-top elementor-widget elementor-widget-icon-box

div.p: An unparalleled institution committed to providing students with a conservatory arts education.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-36edf81 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-cf26417 section-meta-title type-2 font-basker elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor
elementor-element elementor-element-87b1b8b excelent-teacher-content font-calibri elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor

div.p: Discover how you can have a meaningful impact in the lives of our scholars and earn a free masters degree through our ClassiCorps Teaching Fellowship.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-70609e5 elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section
elementor-element elementor-element-7014453 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-inner-section

div.p: Surround yourself with educators, families, and scholars committed to educational excellence in the South Bronx. Subscribe to our newsletter to learn from our educators, benefit from the insights of our families, and be inspired by the success of our scholars.

div.class: events-tracker-for-elementor elementor-element elementor-element-1a00a63 elementor-align-right light elementor-tablet-align-center elementor-widget elementor-widget-button

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-adaf433 elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

p.span: I received academic and personal support to help my child overcome any obstacles he may have had. It takes a village to raise a child and I can truly say the Teachers, Deans and Faculty members at Classical Charter Schools all had a hand in getting my child where he needed to be.

My scholar has been at Classical since kindergarten. I am so happy to see her growth throughout the years. I also see a major positive difference between this school at the school that my son attends. Here at Classical, the High School admissions process is so much more involved and it really helped me understand what my child would need to be successful in High School.

div.h4: Non-CMO Charter In New York City

p.span: Learn how our rigorous structure, thoughtful application of data, and intentional staff development contribute to an excellent education for our scholars.
